content: *this unique sampler scarf features four different stitches for a fun textured scarf that keeps you warm lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80700ad skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 3 balls *shown in dusty blue * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm patterns seed stitch ladder stitch grit stitch lacy grit stitch dividing row are worked in half_double_crochet u s see 80902ad fisherman road scarf 1 for the fishermen s wool version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fisherman-road-scarf
